ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lvl 52 song
ygData.msgSnippet: Let s assume that you are gonna get hit.  Now, do you want +34 AC or not? If you want to refresh the AC, pulse the song. I have my drum equipped because I
ygData.messageBody:
Let's assume that you are gonna get hit. Now, do you want +34 AC or not?
If you want to refresh the AC, pulse the song.

I have my drum equipped because I normally use chants instead of melee
weapons. The thing is - there are different ways of doing things. Ever
drive on the highway and see some guy weaving in and out, passing all the
cars, because he's using 'superior' driving skills, passes you - in the slow
lane - by. And then, a little later, you pull up along side him at the
traffic light?

Sylly


>But that 34 ac is gone as soon as you get hit. I could sing (not play)
>Verses of Victory and get a still substantial ac boost which remains the
>whole pulse cycle.
